rComments: Classes were a pleasure to attend. We covered some very interesting material. Bemrose wove the readings into the greater theme of the course smoothly. Assignments were manageable and fairly graded. I really liked his course. I found some of the topics he spoke on quite riveting.
He's nice but he is horrible at communicating his ideas. The lectures will bore you stiff. He's detailed over email but cannot seem to communicate in person.

Bemrose is awesome!! Highly highly recommend. His feedback on short stories is very helpful, and he's incredibly sweet and caring. And his classes are always interesting, and he has lots of funny anecdotes.

I've had the pleasure of taking two classes with Professor Bemrose. He is incredibly kind and well-read. He prepares amazing lectures but always makes sure the students have a say and encourages discussion. Seriously a smart and nice guy!!

Prof. Bemrose is an incredibly kind, patient teacher who goes out of his way to make himself available to students. He provides lots of feedback both in-class and on assignments. His lectures are always calm and low-key but that's not to say he doesn't offer loads of great insight. The workload was light, and he's by no means a tough grader
Such a intelligent and caring teacher!

Professor Bemrose is absolutely WONDERFUL! Kind, patient, and genuinely interested and excited about what he teaches. I took VIC271 (Creative Writing) and VIC275 (Reading the Wild) and it was such a pleasure to have him twice in a row. His courses have NO EXAMS and have very accessible assignments.  Very understanding regarding disabilities too!
